name: Steve moon
coverLetter: Work well with others and also Excel working independently. Maintain a positive and professional attitude. 15 plus years experience working in the nonprofit and County Government Arena providing safety net services to the community's most vulnerable population. Available as soon as possible and the time frame able to work is open. Shelter accommodations are requested. Willing and able to work more than 40 hours per week if necessary. Experience with trimmer work has been on a small scale in a personal Garden in the home setting. Currently employed as a caretaker and caring for a family member. Obtaining work at this time would be greatly beneficial to me and my family
